refnamediv.refpurpose: Rotates the view or an object by xyz degrees.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Rotates the view or an object by xyz degrees. Exactly what and how it is rotated are dependent on MGEDs state as well as the state of the display manager. See arot for a similar capability.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The two examples show the use of the rot command to rotate the view or object by a specified number of degrees about the x, y, or z axis.

example.title: Rotate the view or object a specified number of degrees about the z axis.
example.para: Rotates the view or object 45° about the z axis.

example.title: Rotate the view or object a specified number of degrees about the y and x axes.
example.para: Rotates the view or object 45° about the y axis, then rotates 45° about the x axis.
